column2: BRIEF-Sunstone Hotel Investors Q1 Loss Per Share $0.08 May 7 (Reuters) - Sunstone Hotel Investors Inc: * SUNSTONE HOTEL INVESTORS REPORTS RESULTS FOR FIRST QUARTER 2018 * SEES Q2 2018 ADJUSTED FFO ATTRIBUTABLE TO COMMON STOCKHOLDERS PER DILUTED SHARE $0.34 TO $0.36 * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED FFO ATTRIBUTABLE TO COMMON STOCKHOLDERS PER DILUTED SHARE $1.07 TO $1.16 * Q1 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $0.19 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S; Q2 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $0.36 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $1.13 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
